channel.title: Woooow i need help
channel.description: lol so its been a wile since i played rsc p servers and i cant get the dam client to load a i downloaded java um any thing else o its a hp win 7 please help iam drunk and bored

item.title: Woooow i need help
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

First try to this sober lol

Second just check the “.bat” files, if you don’t have them just make a new text file with this:

@echo off java -cp rscd.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/jmf.jar org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient pause

If it is rscangel, just check what is on your lib folder and fix the runclient.bat file.

Read full topic
